verses.verse: "If you will <S%H7725>return,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "if you will <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H5493>me,<s%> and if you will put away your <S%H8251>abominations<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight;<s%> then you shall not be <S%H5110>removed;<s%>

and you shall <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'As Yahweh <S%H2416>lives,<s%>' in <S%H571>truth,<s%> in <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and in <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%> The <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> themselves in <S%H1984>him,<s%> and in him shall they glory."

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> "Break <S%H5214>up<s%> your fallow <S%H5215>ground,<s%> and <S%H2232>don't<s%> sow among <S%H6975>thorns.<s%>

<S%H4135>Circumcise<s%> yourselves to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H6190>foreskins<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> you <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> lest my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> like <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H1197>burn<s%> so that none can <S%H3518>quench<s%> <S%H6440>it,<s%> because of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

<S%H5046>Declare<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8628><s%> 'Blow the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in the <S%H776>land!<s%>' <S%H7121>Cry<s%> <S%H4390>aloud<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H622><s%> 'Assemble <S%H935>yourselves!<s%> Let us go into the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities!<s%>'

Set <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>standard<s%> toward <S%H6726>Zion.<s%> Flee for <S%H5756>safety!<s%> <S%H5975>Don't<s%> wait; for I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> from the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>"

A <S%H738>lion<s%> is gone <S%H5927>up<s%> from his <S%H5441>thicket,<s%> and a <S%H7843>destroyer<s%> of <S%H1471>nations;<s%> he is on his <S%H5265>way,<s%> he is gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> from his <S%H4725>place,<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8047>desolate,<s%> that your <S%H5892>cities<s%> be laid <S%H5327>waste,<s%> without <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>

For this <S%H2296>clothe<s%> yourself with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> <S%H5594>lament<s%> and <S%H3213>wail;<s%> for the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7725>hasn't<s%> turned back from us.

"It shall happen at that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "that the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H6>perish,<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> shall <S%H8539>wonder.<s%>"

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>"Ah,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H403>Surely<s%> you have <S%H5377>greatly<s%> <S%H5377>deceived<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7965><s%> 'You shall have peace;' whereas the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5060>reaches<s%> to the <S%H5315>heart.<s%>"

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> shall it be <S%H559>said<s%> to this <S%H5971>people<s%> and to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> "A <S%H6703>hot<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> from the bare <S%H8205>heights<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> not to <S%H2219>winnow,<s%> nor to <S%H1305>cleanse;<s%>
a <S%H4392>full<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> from these shall <S%H935>come<s%> for <S%H1696>me.<s%> Now I will also utter judgments against <S%H4941>them.<s%>"

<S%H5927>Behold,<s%> he shall come up as <S%H6051>clouds,<s%> and his <S%H4818>chariots<s%> shall be as the <S%H5492>whirlwind:<s%> his <S%H5483>horses<s%> are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> than <S%H5404>eagles.<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> to <S%H7703>us!<s%> For we are ruined.

<S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H3526>wash<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> from <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> that you may be <S%H3467>saved.<s%> How long shall your <S%H205>evil<s%> <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> <S%H3885>lodge<s%> within <S%H7130>you?<s%>
For a <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H5046>declares<s%> from <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> and <S%H8085>publishes<s%> <S%H205>evil<s%> from the <S%H669>hills<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%>

<S%H2142>"Tell<s%> the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> <S%H8085>behold,<s%> publish against <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H5341><s%> 'Watchers <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> and <S%H5414>raise<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%> against the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
As <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of a <S%H7704>field,<s%> they are against her all <S%H5439>around,<s%> because she has been <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> against <S%H5002>me,<s%>'" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"Your <S%H1870>way<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings<s%> have <S%H6213>brought<s%> these things to <S%H7451>you.<s%> This is your wickedness; for it is <S%H4751>bitter,<s%> for it <S%H5060>reaches<s%> to your <S%H3820>heart.<s%>"

My <S%H4578>anguish,<s%> my <S%H4578>anguish!<s%> I am <S%H2342>pained<s%> at my <S%H7023>very<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> in <S%H2790>me;<s%> I can't hold my peace; because you have <S%H8085>heard,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> the <S%H8643>alarm<s%> of <S%H4421>war.<s%>

<S%H7667>Destruction<s%> on <S%H7667>destruction<s%> is <S%H7121>cried;<s%> for the whole <S%H776>land<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste:<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> are my <S%H168>tents<s%> <S%H7703>destroyed,<s%> and my <S%H3407>curtains<s%> in a <S%H7281>moment.<s%>
How long shall I <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5251>standard,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet?<s%>

"For my <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H191>foolish,<s%> they <S%H3045>don't<s%> know <S%H5530>me.<s%> They are foolish <S%H1121>children,<s%> and they have no <S%H995>understanding.<s%> They are <S%H2450>skillful<s%> in doing <S%H7489>evil,<s%> but to do <S%H3190>good<s%> they have no <S%H3045>knowledge.<s%>"
I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H8414>and,<s%> behold, it was waste and <S%H922>void;<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and they had no <S%H216>light.<s%>
I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H7493>behold,<s%> they trembled, and all the <S%H1389>hills<s%> moved back and <S%H7043>forth.<s%>
I <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H120>behold,<s%> there was no man, and all the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> had <S%H5074>fled.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and <S%H3759>behold,<s%> the fruitful field was a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and all its <S%H5892>cities<s%> were broken <S%H5422>down<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> before his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>
For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "The whole <S%H776>land<s%> shall be a <S%H8077>desolation;<s%> yet will I not <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end.<s%>

For this the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H56>mourn,<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> be <S%H6937>black;<s%> because I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H2161>it,<s%> I have purposed <S%H5162>it,<s%> and I have not repented, neither will I turn back from <S%H7725>it.<s%>"

Every <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H1272>flees<s%> for the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> and <S%H7198>archers;<s%> they <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H5645>thickets,<s%> and climb <S%H5927>up<s%> on the <S%H3710>rocks:<s%> every <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H5800>forsaken,<s%> and not a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3427>dwells<s%> <S%H2004>therein.<s%>

<S%H7703>You,<s%> when you are made desolate, what will you <S%H6213>do?<s%> Though you <S%H3847>clothe<s%> yourself with <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> though you <S%H5710>deck<s%> you with <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> though you <S%H7167>enlarge<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> with <S%H6320>paint,<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%> do you make yourself <S%H3302>beautiful;<s%> your <S%H5689>lovers<s%> <S%H3988>despise<s%> <S%H1245>you,<s%> they seek your <S%H5315>life.<s%>

For I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> as of a woman in <S%H2470>travail,<s%> the <S%H6869>anguish<s%> as of her who brings forth her first <S%H1069>child,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> who <S%H3306>gasps<s%> for <S%H6566>breath,<s%> who spreads her <S%H3709>hands,<s%> <S%H188>saying,<s%> "Woe is me <S%H5315>now!<s%> For my soul <S%H5888>faints<s%> before the <S%H2026>murderers.<s%>"
